title: sAgara tuyaramE (sj)
sahitya:
sAgara tuyaramE pOmpaDi inrE aDimaikk-aruLvAi samsAra
sAgara tuyaramE pOmpaDi inrE aDimaikk-aruLvAi iraiyAdamaivai ena


1:  alaigaLAm piNIgaLAl migu avadi nAn paDa manadu keDavum viDa
dharumamO dayavadAi idu taruNamE nI malaiyAdenavE mozhindiDu
 caraNam 2    dhAraNiyin iDar tavirtta punitA dharuma nIDu tirumanidA dhoni tA kani tA 
nidamum tA abhayam tA aruLum piratAni aranI enin tApara tAraka dAyakamum tA nI
 caraNam 3    vArum aDimaiu allO manadum kallO marandiDa ninaittiDil manam sahittiDEn 
vaLar vinaip-payan paDi enai ini malar bhuviyil tuyar paDa viTTAl nAn 
keTTumaDivEn toTTAl nAn shuddhamaDaivEn taTTAmal malar karam tanil 
uyar pera tiruvaruL puri dhAraNiyil unadu perum pugazh nidam paDitt-enrum magizha
